name: 3 Ingredient Vegan Caramel Sauce
description: 3 Ingredient Vegan Caramel Sauce is easy to make and perfect for topping non-dairy ice cream or any other dessert! Comes together in just 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small pan or pot, add the coconut cream, brown sugar and cornstarch. Heat over medium-high heat, stirring constantly while the coconut cream melts. The mixture will get bubbly and almost foamy. Lower the heat to a simmer and stir frequently for about 5 minutes. If you want salted caramel, add a pinch of salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat. The caramel can be used immediately, or let it cool and it will thicken considerably. Each time you go to use it, give it a good stir. Store leftover caramel in a covered glass container in the refrigerator for about a week.
